TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlFormParameterReader extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader

summary.span: 為使用 HTTP 實作的 Web 服務讀取連入的要求參數，將參數的名稱 / 值組編碼在類似 HTML 的表單中，而不是編碼為 SOAP 訊息。

span.span: Reads incoming request parameters for Web services implemented using HTTP, with name-value pairs encoded like an HTML form rather than as a SOAP message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別和其他類別命名空間支援.NET Framework 實作 Web 服務透過 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 作業。 and other classes in the namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. Web 服務寫入器和讀取序列化和還原序列化，分別參數或 Web 方法的傳回物件之間的 HTTP 要求或回應資料流。Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams. Web 服務寫入器和讀取器使用 HTTP 傳輸，但不會交換使用 SOAP 標準的訊息。Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard. 服務端類別提供方法來讀取參數名稱 / 值組是編碼傳入 HTTP 要求主體的 MIME 類型與`application/x-www-form-urlencoded`。The service-side class provides a method to read parameter name-value pairs that are encoded into the body of an HTTP request with the MIME type `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`. 您通常會不需要使用直接。You typically will not need to use directly. ASP.NET 組態檔的 (Web.config) 時，會啟用 HTTP POST Web 服務[\<通訊協定 > 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3b301dc-855c-4062-8bcf-5ccadb598fab)元素包含[\<新增 > 項目\<通訊協定>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/abaa41b9-aa8b-469f-8ae5-e58c4d3a2921)項目其`name`屬性的值是"HttpPost"。HTTP-POST Web services are enabled when an ASP.NET configuration file's (Web.config) [\ Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3b301dc-855c-4062-8bcf-5ccadb598fab) element contains an [\ Element for \](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/abaa41b9-aa8b-469f-8ae5-e58c4d3a2921) element whose `name` attribute's value is "HttpPost". 啟用的 HTTP POST Web 服務，並收到適用的 HTTP 要求時，會自動使用類別。The class is automatically used when an HTTP-POST Web service is enabled and an applicable HTTP request is received.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object[] Read(class System.Web.HttpRequest request) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (request As HttpRequest) As Object()

param.name: request
param.span: 物件，包含編碼為 HTTP 要求主體的 HTTP 名稱 / 值組。

span.span: An object containing HTML name-value pairs encoded in the body of an HTTP request.

summary.span: 將名稱 / 值組讀入 Web 方法參數值。

span.span: Reads name-value pairs into Web method parameter values.

returns.span: 物件的陣列包含名稱/值組。

span.span: An array of objects contain the name-value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用的內容物件的屬性。The method uses the content of the object's property.
